title: [K-12] Mobile-based Self-management and Lifestyle Improvement Program for Patients with Type 2 Diabetes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic diabetes knowledge and fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Conducting diabetes management practice by implementing real-life scenarios in VR, with interaction with peer learners via smartphone-based social networking

learning_goals: Learners can explain the pathophysiological mechanisms of Type 2 diabetes and strategies for preventing complications.
Learners can record healthy meal plans and exercise routines via a mobile platform at least three times weekly.
Learners can perform blood glucose measurement, medication management, and stress-coping techniques with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
